projects.name: Smart Saving Tracker
projects.description: Personal SaaS expense tracking application with AI-powered natural language input. The AI automatically categorizes and records transactions.

metrics.value: 95% accuracy in natural language parsing and transaction categorization using OpenAI integration
Built complete MVP in one week using modern development tools and AI assistance
Planning subscription model and advanced features for full SaaS monetization

responsibilities: Built complete MVP with AI-powered natural language expense input
Implemented user authentication and data persistence with Supabase
Created responsive UI with Material UI for cross-device compatibility
Integrated OpenAI API for intelligent transaction parsing and categorization
Deployed and maintained production application on Vercel

projects.name: Avalorians
projects.description: Telegram Mini-app PvP battle game with city building mechanics. Built as a Clash Royale-like experience with reward-based progression.

metrics.value: Mentored a junior frontend developer and led the entire frontend development
Built real-time PvP battles, city building system, and game mechanics
Reduced frontend load times by 50% and implemented linear interpolation to stabilize frame rate across devices
Implemented adaptive delta timing on multiplayer server to handle network latency and maintain game synchronization
Scaled multiplayer server to support 100+ concurrent game sessions while maintaining low CPU and memory usage

responsibilities: Managed and mentored junior frontend developer
Built the entire game UI from Figma designs
Created PvP battle system and city building mechanics
Built and maintained multiplayer server with Colyseus

projects.name: Dummy Pirates
projects.description: Multiplayer Sea Battle Arena with unique ships and abilities.
responsibilities: Built ship customization system where players can equip different hulls, sails, and weapons
Created multiplayer battle mechanics for 4v4 sea battles with unique ship abilities
Connected game to Steam for achievements and player progress tracking

projects.name: Cyberdogz
projects.description: Web-based game experience featuring NFT-integrated gameplay.
responsibilities: Built unified wallet connection system that supports both MetaMask and Solana wallets in a single interface

projects.name: Event Horizon: Space Shooter
projects.description: Top-down space shooter with partial damage mechanics and ship variety.
responsibilities: Built space shooter with 30+ levels, boss battles, and progression system
Created partial destruction system where players can destroy individual ship parts
Designed achievement system and ship upgrade progression with 50+ upgrades

projects.name: Legends of the Pit v2.0
projects.description: 3D virtual cockfighting simulation game with cinematic combat sequences.

metrics.value: Built combat system with customizable battle rules and randomized action sequences for dynamic gameplay

responsibilities: Assisted senior developer in building the battle system
Created combat manager for virtual cockfighting matches
Built randomized action sequences for dynamic gameplay

projects.name: Order Management Tool | Globe Online
projects.description: Internal ticketing system for order processing and customer service management.
responsibilities: Built internal ticketing system for order processing and customer service
Created customer service workflow system with form validation
Built full-stack features using AngularJS frontend and Spring Boot backend

projects.name: HIMS 2.0 | Veridata Networks Inc.
projects.description: Healthcare Management Information System with membership, customer care, and admin modules.
responsibilities: Built customer care module with dynamic form system for patient management

projects.name: RFP | Mitchell Madison Group
projects.description: Request for Proposal management system with form-based workflow and document processing.
